text.div:
AllergyIntoleranceSubjectNameSearchParameter

Parameter subject.name:string

Searches for AllergyIntolerance based on the patient's full or partial name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/AllergyIntolerance?subject:Patient.name={name}

ResourceAllergyIntolerance
Expression(none)
Target ResourcesAllergyIntolerance
MultiplesThe parameter cannot repeat or have multiple values

name: AllergyIntoleranceSubjectNameSearchParameter
description: Searches for AllergyIntolerance based on the patient's full or partial name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/AllergyIntolerance?subject:Patient.name={name}
